materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a portrait photograph of a Burmese woman. She is standing in the middle, with her right arm holding on to the back of a wooden chair. She is wearing a flowery head piece, earrings, necklaces, a long sleeved top and a wrapped skirt with shoes. Her left hand is holding on to the skirt. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Burmese Woman, A Clerk's Wife
subject_terms_2: Photographs Portrait photography Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Ethnic costume Indigenous people
